name: Valid MAC Addresses
description: Looks for valid MAC Addresses, negating any zeros, F's, 88's or 87's.
content:
Special MAC's to not match (IE: Self-assigned, Broadcast, empty):
88-88-88-88-87-88
FF:FF:FF-FF-FF-FF
00-00-00-00-00-00

Other MAC's valid and invalid:
3D:F2:C9:A6:B3:4F
3D:F2:C9:FF:B3:4F
3D:F2:AC9:A6:B3:4F
3D:F2:00:A6:B3:4F
3D:F2:C9:A6:B3:4G
3d:f2:c9:a6:b3:4f
3D-F2-00-A6-B3-4F
08-F2:C9-A6:B3-4F
88-F2:C9-A6:B3-4F
author: VIP
